broadwick.montecarlo

Class MonteCarloDefaultResults

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.MonteCarloDefaultResults
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonteCarloResults, Cloneable

    public class MonteCarloDefaultResults
extends Object
implements MonteCarloResults
    A default implementation for the MonteCarloResults interface.

    • Field Detail

      • samples

        private Samples samples

    • Constructor Detail

      • MonteCarloDefaultResults

        MonteCarloDefaultResults()
        Create a default implementation of the MonteCarloResults class. This class stores a single result from a Monte Carlo simulation and returns the mean of this value over all simulations as the expected value.

    • Method Detail

      • getExpectedValue

        public final double getExpectedValue()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloResults
        Get the score for the Monte Carlo simulation. The Acceptor interface and it's implementing classes require a known value in this class for their analysis, e.g. this method may return the likelihood of the simulation and the Acceptor class (e.g. MetropolisHastingsAcceptor) will use the McResults.getExpectedValue() method to determine whether or not to accept this proposed step.
        Specified by:
        getExpectedValue in interface MonteCarloResults
        Returns:
        the value of the score.

      • getSamples

        public final Samples getSamples()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloResults
        Get the results of the Monte Carlo simulations as a Samples object.
        Specified by:
        getSamples in interface MonteCarloResults
        Returns:
        A samples object that contains the results of each Monte Carlo Simulation.

      • toCsv

        public final String toCsv()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloResults
        Get a CSV string of the Monte Carlo results stored in this class. This will be used for logging and for output to file and can contain statistics about the results e.g. the mean, std deviation etc. as appropriate.
        Specified by:
        toCsv in interface MonteCarloResults
        Returns:
        a CSV representation of the results.

      • join

        public final MonteCarloResults join(MonteCarloResults results)
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloResults
        Join another Monte Carlo results object to this one. When running a Monte Carlo simulation it is often necessary to append the results from a simulation to a 'master' results object.
        Specified by:
        join in interface MonteCarloResults
        Parameters:
        results - the results object to join.
        Returns:
        the new/updated results object.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloResults
        Clear the results of the MonteCarloResults object. This will be called by several algorithms (e.g. MCMC) to clear any cached results that should be cleared between runs.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface MonteCarloResults
